CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Fosterborough Stars?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Fosterborough Stars is arc {Edwardsborough Bulls}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Rebeccaview Dolphins?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Rebeccaview Dolphins is arc {Edwardsborough Bulls}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {South Stars} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {New Chiefs} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from South Stars to Fosterborough Stars in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Fosterborough Stars to South Stars in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from New Chiefs to Edwardsborough Bulls in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between South Stars and New Chiefs in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between South Stars and New Chiefs is {401}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Fosterborough Stars and New Chiefs in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Fosterborough Stars and New Chiefs is {162}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Rebeccaview Dolphins?
SC.A: The total flow output from Rebeccaview Dolphins is {241}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Edwardsborough Bulls?
SC.A: The total flow input by Edwardsborough Bulls is {443}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 387? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {401} from {South Stars} to {New Chiefs}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 182? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {162} from {New Chiefs} to {Fosterborough Stars}, a flow of {141} from {New Chiefs} to {Edwardsborough Bulls}, a flow of {122} from {Edwardsborough Bulls} to {New Chiefs}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 207 and 282? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {263} from {Edwardsborough Bulls} to {Fosterborough Stars}, a flow of {241} from {Rebeccaview Dolphins} to {New Chiefs}, a flow of {212} from {New Chiefs} to {Rebeccaview Dolphins}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from South Stars to Fosterborough Stars or from Fosterborough Stars to New Chiefs?
NC.A: The flow from {South Stars} to {Fosterborough Stars} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Fosterborough Stars to Edwardsborough Bulls, from Edwardsborough Bulls to Fosterborough Stars, or from South Stars to Fosterborough Stars?
NC.A: The flow from {South Stars} to {Fosterborough Stars} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Rebeccaview Dolphins}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {New Chiefs} and {South Stars}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Fosterborough Stars, Arc South Stars, Arc New Chiefs, Arc Edwardsborough Bulls, Arc Rebeccaview Dolphins}.
